source:
documents_with_infrequent_words <- function(documents) {
  split <- documents %>%
    mutate(word = str_split(text, " ")) %>%
    unnest()
  freq <- split %>% count(word)
  unique_words <- freq %>% filter(n == 1)
  split %>% 
    filter(word %in% unique_words$word) %>%
    pull(id) %>%
    unique()
}
